author: Andrew Loudon
description: Rum-laced and full-flavoured with rich pineapple fruit balanced by white wine and lime juice acidity.
name: Silver Pineapple
recipeIngredient: 35 ml White/gold 1-3 year old mellow light rum
10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
